    • Uses of FileWatcher in org.neo4j.io.fs.watcher

      Classes in org.neo4j.io.fs.watcher that implement FileWatcher 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  DefaultFileSystemWatcher
      File watcher that monitors registered directories state using possibilities provided by WatchService.
      class  SilentFileWatcher
      Silent file watcher implementation that do not perform any monitoring and can't observe any directories status or content update.
